title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
rt_quote: A moving, inspirational tale of hope and perseverance.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.
rt_quote: A masterwork of cinematic storytelling and character study.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on chaos.
rt_quote: An epic crime saga with riveting performances and blockbuster thrills.

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone and the rise of his son Michael as the new Don.
rt_quote: A rare sequel that equals or surpasses the original.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury holds out in a murder trial, forcing each member to confront their own biases.
rt_quote: An absorbing, powerful study in character and consensus.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland, Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.
rt_quote: A haunting and deeply human chronicle of compassion during horror.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to aid Frodo and Sam.
rt_quote: A sweeping fantasy finale of immense heart and spectacle.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in violent and unexpected ways.
rt_quote: A wildly original mix of satire, pulp, and pop culture brilliance.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit sets out with companions to destroy a powerful ring.
rt_quote: An enchanting and visually stunning beginning to a legendary trilogy.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third.
rt_quote: A definitive spaghetti western filled with style and grit.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and more through the eyes of Forrest Gump.
rt_quote: Sentimental and sincere, with a powerhouse performance from Tom Hanks.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club.
rt_quote: Bold, controversial, and unforgettable.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a task of inception.
rt_quote: Visually stunning and intellectually challenging.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: The Fellowship is broken but fights on to protect Middle-earth from darkness.
rt_quote: Dark, sweeping, and grand — a worthy sequel.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
description: Luke Skywalker trains with Yoda and faces Darth Vader in a pivotal battle.
rt_quote: A landmark sequel with deeper drama and iconic moments.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the nature of his reality and joins a rebellion.
rt_quote: Stylish and groundbreaking sci-fi action.

title: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill.
rt_quote: Scorsese's masterpiece — gripping and authentic.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
description: A criminal fakes insanity and enters a mental institution, where he challenges authority.
rt_quote: Jack Nicholson at his best in this powerful, tragic story.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motive.
rt_quote: Dark, gripping, and disturbing — a modern noir.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an imprisoned killer to catch another criminal.
rt_quote: Chilling, intelligent, and unforgettable.

title: The Good Dinosaur
description: A young dinosaur sets out on an epic journey with a human boy.
rt_quote: A stunning visual journey with heart and adventure.

title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
description: Sid finds himself in a strange underground world of dinosaurs.
rt_quote: A silly, thrilling ride that kids will enjoy.

title: Land Before Time
description: Young dinosaurs go on a journey to find a new home.
rt_quote: A timeless classic that captures the imagination of every child.

title: When Harry Met Sally
description: Can men and women ever just be friends? This classic romcom explores the journey of two people over the years.
rt_quote: Smart, sweet, and surprisingly honest.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
description: A modern adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Taming of the Shrew' set in a high school.
rt_quote: Funny, sharp, and full of heart.

title: Notting Hill
description: A bookstore owner’s life changes when he meets a famous actress.
rt_quote: Charming, witty, and feel-good.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the truth about reality and joins a resistance movement.
rt_quote: Stylish and groundbreaking.

title: Top Gun
description: Students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best.
rt_quote: Slick and adrenaline-fueled.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: An American agent goes rogue after being framed.
rt_quote: Tense and stylish.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance for his dog.
rt_quote: Relentless action and cool style.

title: Gone Girl
description: A husband becomes the prime suspect when his wife disappears.
rt_quote: Dark and endlessly twisty.

title: Prisoners
description: When his daughter is kidnapped, a father takes matters into his own hands.
rt_quote: Powerful and unsettling.
